revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:imported>M86|imported>M86]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT3200AC |revision=M v1 |asin=B01JOXW3YE,B06Y5W188F |newegg=N82E16833124634 |series=AC3200 |price=249.99 |est_release_date=05/18/2016 |fcc_date=09/21/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT3200ACM |ic_id=3839A-WRT3200ACM |pcb_id=48SAM203.SGD |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820;88F6820-A0 C180; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML02G2 |fla2=32 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=SPI |fla2_num=2 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=2 |ram2=256 |ram2_brand=Micron |ram2_model=DDR3 |ram2_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header |serial=yes,, 6-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8964;88W8964-BTW2; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8887;88W8887-NAA2; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8964;88W8964-BTW2; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6352 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.70; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, LEDE Project, McDebian |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=60:38:E0 |oui_eth=60:38:E0 }}
:• '''2600''' Mbps - 3-stream 802.11ac device (160MHz bandwidth, 867Mbps/stream), :• '''600''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC3200 MU-MIMO Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WRT3200ACM/ Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT3200ACM}} :[http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/dofc/CE%20DoC%20WRT3200ACM.pdf DoC download] "48SAM203.SGD" and "2016.05.18" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Linksys WRT32X|Wistron NeWeb}} *[[Linksys WRT3200ACM]] (Rango) FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-WRT3200ACM Q87-WRT3200ACM] ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C180 @1.8GHz ([http://www.marvell.com/embedded-processors/armada-38x/ Armada 385]) *Flash: ''AMD / Spansion'' 256MB (NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) *WLAN: 2x [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/avastar/88W8964/ 88W8964] 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) ::: 1x [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/avastar/88W8887/ 88W8887] 1T1R 802.11ac, BT 4.2, NFC, FM rec *Switch: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/switching/link-street/ 88E6352] (7-Port AVB GbE Switch, 5x GbE PHY) :Uses a 12V / 3A power adapter ===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt3200acm WRT3200ACM] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.8GHz (Rango) *[https://github.com/Chadster766/McDebian/wiki On the '''McDebian''' Wiki] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33030-linksys-wrt3200acm-ac3200-mu-mimo-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT3200ACM MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :• CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C180 @1.8GHz (Armada 385 ARMv7) :• 2.4GHz Radio: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/assets/Marvell_Avastar_88W8964_SoC-01_PB_v2.pdf 88W8964]-BTW2 WiSoC (MU-MIMO) ::4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85309-11 2.4GHz Front End Module ::Micron 128MB DDR3 RAM :• 5GHz Radio: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/assets/Marvell_Avastar_88W8964_SoC-01_PB_v2.pdf 88W8964]-BTW2 WiSoC (MU-MIMO) ::[[Marvell]] 88W8887-NAA2 DFS monitor (WLAN/BT/NFC/FM) ::4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85728-11 5GHz Front End Module ::Micron 128MB DDR3 RAM :• Switch: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/switching/link-street/ 88E6352] GbE Switch *[http://www.gadgetreview.com/linksys-wrt3200acm-mu-mimo-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT3200ACM'' on '''GadgetReview'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=304086&sid=5a0c57e12a2b937203c837943abee0b2 ''Linksys WRT3200ACM ??'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-3200acm-rumors-the-big-blue-router-hits-wave-2.34563/ ''Linksys WRT-3200ACM - The Big Blue Router Hits Wave 2'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt3200acm-usb-to-ttl-connection.35393/ ''Linksys WRT3200ACM USB to TTL Connection'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://github.com/kaloz/mwlwifi/issues/152 ''Increased memory usage on WRT3200ACM'' on '''mwlwifi'''] ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Boot log >> • |
